import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from "axios" import { Container, Card, Row, Col, Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap" const WorkoutScreen = ({match}) => { const [workout, setWorkout] = useState({ _id: '1', isPrivate: false, date: '2021-09-19T12:00-0500', clients: [ { _id: 1, name: 'Reem Stamker', email: 'Reem@example.com', phoneNumber: '0501234567', }, { _id: 2, name: 'Peer Stamker', email: 'Peer@example.com', phoneNumber: '0511111111', }, ], duration: 2, equipment: 'dumbells, bars', revenuePerClient: 50, totalRevenue: 150, createdAt: '2021-08-19T12:00-0500', updatedAt: null, isHappened: false, description: 'HIIT Workout', maxClients: 3, currentClients: 2 }) useEffect(() => { const fetchWorkout = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/workouts/${match.params.id}`) console.log(data) } fetchWorkout() }, []) return ( <> { workout ? ( <>

{workout.description}

On {`${workout.date.substring(8,10)}.${workout.date.substring(5,7)}, ${workout.date.substring(11,16)} `}

{`Price: ${workout.revenuePerClient} shekels`}
Duration: { workout.duration > 1 ? `${workout.duration} hours` : `${workout.duration} hour` }
Equipment: {workout.equipment}
Total Revenue: {workout.totalRevenue}
Current Clients Amount: {workout.currentClients}
Max Amount Of Clients: {workout.maxClients}

Clients

{workout.clients.map(client => )}
ID NAME EMAIL PHONE NUMBER
{client._id} {client.name} {client.email} {client.phoneNumber}
) : (
Not a valid workout
) } ) } export default WorkoutScreen
